headline: PTC (PTC): Examining Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Recent Performance and Why PTC Is on Watch PTC (PTC) has quietly slipped over the past few months, with the stock down about 6% over the past month and 17% over the past 3 months, which puts its longer term gains into perspective. See our latest analysis for PTC. Zooming out, that recent weakness comes after a solid multi year run. The latest 1 year total shareholder return of negative 11.2% contrasts sharply with a roughly 58% 5 year total shareholder return, suggesting momentum has cooled...
